name: Lunar Blade
description:
111% 9th game Lunar Blade!!

Jump and destroy buildings with awesome swords!
Conquer famous buildings around the world!
Upgrade to gain power.
Get stronger swords for ultimate smashing!

This is a simple and addictive game.
How long can you survive on Lunar Blade?

Simple, but Addictive
Lunar Blade by 111%
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Features:
- Challenge your friends with GameCenter support.
- Easy and fun to play.
- Check our facebook page, 111%, to get hidden sword.
- Colorful UI, Fun sound effects, Attractive swords.
BBTAN, CCTAN, DDTAN, POPONG!, Charles, CtrlCV, Good night RUDY, RoadStar and Lunar Blade.
Share your screenshots online SNS such as Facebook, Instagram or Snapchat.
Enjoy Lunar Blade while you commute, on a date, in the bus or subway, waiting at the bank and so on. Anytime, anywhere you can play Lunar Blade!!11
